name: Scaffold Custom Module and Deploy
query: Create an expense management module for Odoo 19 and generate a production deployment for insightpulseai.net
expected_behavior: Step 1: Understands user wants to create an Odoo module
Step 2: Uses bash_tool to create module directory structure (addons/ipai_expense_management/)
Step 3: Generates __manifest__.py with AGPL-3 license, version 19.0.1.0.0, dependencies
Step 4: Creates __init__.py files for Python package initialization
Step 5: Generates README.rst in OCA format
Step 6: Creates models/, views/, security/ directories
Step 9: Validates module structure matches OCA standards
Step 10: For deployment request, generates docker-compose.yml
Step 11: Creates nginx/nginx.conf with SSL and security headers
Step 12: Generates config/odoo.conf with production settings
Step 15: Reports: 'Created module ipai_expense_management' with file list
Step 16: Reports: 'Generated production deployment for insightpulseai.net' with next steps
success_criteria: Module created in addons/ directory with proper structure
__manifest__.py has all required fields (name, version, license, author)
Docker-compose.yml created with Odoo 19, PostgreSQL/Supabase, Nginx
nginx.conf includes SSL configuration and security headers
Uses bash_tool, create_file tools (no custom MCP servers required)
